SUBJECTIVE
55 YR OLD MALE WITH HTN WHO PRESENTS WITH HEADACHE AND BLURRED VISION. BP AT HOME WAS 210/120. DENIES CHEST PAIN OR SHORTNESS OF BREATH.

OBJECTIVE
VITALS: BP 196/108 HR 82 RR 16 TEMP 98.6 SPO2 98%
ALERT, ANXIOUS. HEENT NORMAL. HEART RRR. LUNGS CLEAR.

ASSESSMENT
HYPERTENSIVE URGENCY

PLAN
CLONIDINE 0.1MG PO NOW
RECHECK BP IN 30 MIN
IF NO IMPROVEMENT CONSIDER LABETALOL IV
FOLLOW UP WITH PCP IN 2 DAYS
